short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable copy (CTRL+C or CMD+C) / paste (CTRL+P or CMD+P) on websites that needlessly block it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension enables you to use things like complex passwords and paste them directly into password fields on sites that prevent this needlessly.
